text:
So at Yseop, we're having an impact
on patients' lives
because we're speeding things up by
giving patients faster access to treatment.
One of our pharma clients told us

that before the writing of an adverse event report, 
for one patient would take four hours,

and today with Yseop, 
with generative AI on AWS,
they are able to do it in four seconds.
My name is Clarisse dos Santos.
I'm the Director of Product Management at Yseop.

Yseop speeds up the
launch of new treatments.

Yseop speeds up the
launch of new treatments.

We're speeding up because we're using
generative artificial intelligence
from AWS to generate documents,
which are mandatory to submit

a new treatment
in the market.

My passion has always been
to enable patients
to have the fastest care possible.
the best possible treatment.

And that's why I worked on both
the diagnosis and the prognosis.

I co-founded a company that develops
and markets medical devices

in imaging especially, for
neurodegenerative diseases.
When I heard about Yseop,

I knew what they were doing and it seemed
like a great opportunity to be able to

help bring medicines
to market more quickly.

The pharmaceutical industry
faces a number of challenges today.

The first is the time between 
the start of clinical trials

to the launch of the
product on the market.

It can take ten years for
a drug to reach the market.
With Yseop and with AWS generative AI,
we manage to close this gap.

We manage to speed up and generate a
large proportion of these documents.
All the tasks that can be done

by artificial intelligence are done,
leaving to the medical writers
the tasks where they really add value

when we need their criticism or their
thoughts and conclusions.

This demand is growing
all the time with new drugs

that need to be brought to
market and with the pressure
to do so more quickly.
Our objective is to accelerate by 3 to 6 months
the global process of market launch of a drug,
which is enormous

At Yseop, we are aware that artificial intelligence
brings a lot into the health sector

but there are also challenges 
and difficulties in using it.

We must always be very precise
in the results we deliver.

AWS has helped us with
providing artificial intelligence
with the necessary precision,

with the security we need
and scalability for all
present and future needs.

The future for Yseop is to
cover the whole document chain,

and we're also going to simplify
the use of this software

to make it much more
accessible to all users.

We aspire to a future where medical
advances reach those
who need them the most at a record speed.

A future where innovation
improves medical outcomes for all.
